attributes.action: Allow zoos in the UK to open of they are able to safely do so.
attributes.additional_details:
Zoos are paramount for the survival of many species of animals that otherwise wouldn't survive. Many running off the money brought in by visitors. 
The cost of keeping the animals safe during the pandemic is having a massive financial effect on even the biggest zoos in the country. Some are bigger than public parks with miles upon miles of pathways. We have some of the best zoos in Europe (and the world)
attributes.background: Allow Zoos and wildlife parks in the UK to reopen with social distancing measures in place.

rejection.details:
